backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access-controlled user profiles, push subscriptions, radio stream checks, and request logging using Map, List, and HTTP outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a marquee speed adjustment feature to affected files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list of frontend file paths with detailed descriptions of each file’s purpose and functionality.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DEBUG.md: Debug notes describing a TypeScript build failure caused by Node.js typings in frontend code.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA metadata, icons, Google Cast SDK, and a React mount timeout recovery UI.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme color, categories, and shortcuts.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling caching, activation cleanup, background asset caching, and push notifications.
frontend/README-verify.md: Guide explaining how to run the frontend verification script to detect build-breaking issues.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node-based script that checks for TypeScript config, banned NodeJS.Timeout usage, background asset correctness, and service worker asset references.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing navigation, audio playback state, background diagnostics, service worker recovery, and query initialization.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: Provides a Chromecast toggle button using useChromecast to start or stop casting and display device/connection status.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Handles PWA installation prompts with platform detection, dismissal logic, and fallback guides for iOS and Android.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with tabs for home, browse, and settings, handling active state and tab changes.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: Provides a compact audio player with track info, album art, and play/pause controls, opening the full player when tapped.
frontend/src/components/player/TrackTitl: Animates long track titles with a marquee effect, supporting motion preferences and pointer/keyboard interaction to pause scrolling.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Implements a volume slider synced with an audio element, updating both UI state and audio volume.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: UI panel for enabling and managing push notification subscriptions with status, errors, and subscribe flow.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Dialog form allowing users to submit song or shoutout requests via useSubmitRequest with validation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Banner prompting users to refresh or reset the app when updates or load errors are detected.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Share button using Web Share API with a fallback modal for manual URL copying and clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Displays show info including image, title, description, genres, and schedule in a clickable card layout.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: Shows a red LIVE badge with a pulsing dot and radio icon.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: Renders a small pulsing accent-colored dot indicating on-air status.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: Displays a styled music notification with icons and colors based on type, showing title, artist, and an optional dismiss button.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Defines a Show interface and exports mock show data with titles, descriptions, genres, schedules, and images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Handles auto-resuming audio playback on visibility changes, page restore, and focus events, with fallbacks for manual resume.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundImageDia: Hook that checks if the body background image loads correctly and logs warnings when missing.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: Hook managing Chromecast initialization, session handling, casting state, and errors for a given stream URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Hook for reading and toggling a boolean favorite flag stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarqueeMeasurement: Hook measuring text overflow and computing marquee animation properties with retries and remount triggers.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Hook detecting track or show changes and managing browser notification permissions and display deduplication.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Hook handling push notification subscription flow, permission requests, SW registration, and backend storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching the stream URL with fallback logic, checking stream availability, fetching now-playing data, and submitting user requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Implements service worker registration, update handling, reset logic, and state tracking with automatic retries and diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Implements a countdown timer that pauses an audio element after a set duration, with controls to start or cancel the timer.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Manages the screen wake lock API, requesting or releasing it based on activity and handling visibility changes and cleanup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, and responsive background image rules for mobile and desktop.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity context providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: Renders a filterable list of mock radio shows with genre and day filters and invokes a callback when a show is selected.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: Main live listening screen showing station header, live status, and play/pause controls with error and loading states.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Displays full now-playing view with album art, track info, playback controls, volume, share, and sleep timer options.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Settings page providing notification controls and a background refresh action that clears cached images.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Presents detailed info for a scheduled show with image, metadata, description, and options like adding to calendar.
Startup diagnostics utility that captures early resource/script errors and optionally shows a recovery overlay.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Google Analytics helper utilities for safe tracking of play, pause, and cast events with metadata.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates downloadable ICS calendar files for shows by computing next show dates and formatting event data. Includes helpers for date conversion and parsing show times.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Normalizes artwork URLs by handling relative, protocol‑relative, and absolute paths while enforcing HTTPS. Returns a cleaned, validated URL or null.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash‑based routing values. Includes helpers to clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, screens, animations, and plugins. Defines project‑specific styling tokens and responsive settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including features, requests, versioning, and project summary. Tracks marquee scrolling speed adjustments and pending enhancements.
